original: Öberg, Sven Erhard, överste, Uddevalla, if. 8/1/96 i Frösö, Jämtl. 1., av trädg :konsul. Johan Ö. o. Lovisa Johansson. G. 28 m. Karin Rosén. Barn : Jan f. 30, Bengt 31, Sten 35. — Stud:-ex. 14. Fänrik v. Jämtl. fältjäg :reg. 16, kapt. v. gen :’staben 33, major 36, öv:-löjtn. v. Bohusl. reg. 41, överste o. chef där sed. 42. Kadettoff. v. KS 29-31, stabischef v. Övre Norrl. trupper 37-39, souschef i lantförsv. kommandoexp. 39-41. Styr:led. i Sv. o-ff :förb. Led. av div. komm. o. utredn. betr. pens:-, av-lön:- o. soc. frågor, stadsfullm. i Uddevalla sed. 42. KS02kl, RVO, FAKSM, LandstSM, Bohusl.-Dals bfb GM, Sthlms IfbSM, FFrK3kl m sv.
translated: Öberg, Sven Erhard, Colonel, Uddevalla, b. 8/1/96 in Frösö, Jämtl. 1st son of consul Johan Ö. and Lovisa Johansson. Married on 28 m. with Karin Rosén. Children: Jan b. 30, Bengt b. 31, Sten b. 35. — Graduated high school in 1914. Ensign in Jämtland Rifle Regiment in 1916, Captain in General Staff in 1933, Major in 1936, Lieutenant Colonel in Bohuslän Regiment in 1941, Colonel and Chief there since 1942. Officer cadet at Karlberg Military Academy from 1929-1931, staff officer in Upper Norrland troops from 1937-1939, deputy chief in Defense Commanding Experiment from 1939-1941. Board member in Swedish Non-commissioned Officers' Association, member of various commissions and investigations concerning pension, salary, and social issues, city council member in Uddevalla since 1942. Knight of the Order of the Sword 2nd class, Order of Vasa, Field Artillery and Cavalry Shooting Medal, Landstorm Shooting Medal, Bohuslän-Dalsland County Shooting Medal, Stockholm Shooting Society Medal, Royal Patriotic Society Gold Medal with blue ribbon.

awards.name: Knight of the Order of the Sword
Field Artillery and Cavalry Shooting Medal
